name: ARGOS DOPPLER
description: Location determined using the frequency shift of transmissions to the ARGOS communications satellite service. http://www.argos-system.org/web/en/333-why-choose-argos.php

name: ARGOS Kalman
description: Location determined using the Kalman filtering technique and the ARGOS communications satellite service. http://www.argos-system.org/web/en/393-faq-kalman.php.

name: From map
description: Location extracted by locating the object on a map.

name: GALILEO
description: Location determined using the European GALILEO global navigation satellite system. http://galileognss.eu/

name: GLONASS
description: Location determined using the Russian GLONASS (Globalnaya Navigazionnaya Sputnikovaya Sistema) global navigation satellite system. https://www.glonass-iac.ru/en/

name: GPS
description: Location determined using the Global Positioning System. http://www.gps.gov/

name: IRIDIUM DOPPLER
description: Location determined using the frequency shift of transmissions to the Iridium communications satellite constellation. https://www.iridium.com/

name: LORAN
description: Location determined using the LORAN (LOng RAnge Navigation) hyperbolic radio system.

name: Survey
description: Location determined using a geographic survey.

name: inapplicable
description: None of the codes in the table are applicable.
